Uses of Interface
com.opengamma.strata.engine.calculations.function.CalculationFunction

  • Packages that use CalculationFunction 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.engine.calculations.function
    Contains the interfaces implemented by functions that perform calculations in the calculation engine.
    com.opengamma.strata.engine.config
    Configuration types for the calculation engine.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation

    • Uses of CalculationFunction in com.opengamma.strata.engine.calculations.function

      Subinterfaces of CalculationFunction in com.opengamma.strata.engine.calculations.function 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CalculationMultiFunction<T extends CalculationTarget>
      A function that calculates multiple values for a target using multiple sets of market data.
      interface  CalculationSingleFunction<T extends CalculationTarget,R>
      A function that calculates a value for a target using multiple sets of market data.
      interface  CurrencyAwareCalculationMultiFunction<T extends CalculationTarget>
      A function that calculates multiple values for a target using multiple sets of market data.
      interface  CurrencyAwareCalculationSingleFunction<T extends CalculationTarget,R>
      A function that calculates currency values for a target using multiple sets of market data.

    • Uses of CalculationFunction in com.opengamma.strata.engine.config

      Classes in com.opengamma.strata.engine.config that implement CalculationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MissingConfigCalculationFunction
      Function used when there is no function registered that can calculate a requested value.

    • Uses of CalculationFunction in com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation

      Classes in com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation that implement CalculationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCalculationFunction<T extends CalculationTarget,R>
      Abstract function calculating a result for each of a set of scenarios.
